column4: Hello, could someone help me with my trouble on installing apache2?
best to just ask the channel your actual question (on a single line)
i purget apache, did rm -rf /etc/apache2 and then apt-get install apache2 and then i got the error
this is not what I said to do
i said what i did before you said me to purge apache2
no, that's not what I said.
:S can you repeat i think i missed some line..
ah works now thanks :) i suppose i purged a meta package and that caused the problems?
right, the config files belong to that apache2.2-common package
